title: Pregnancy Tracker & Day by Day
description:
Download the Pregnancy Tracker App, trusted by millions of parents-to-be worldwide!

The Pregnancy Calendar app is your reliable companion every day throughout your pregnancy. It provides more than just information – it offers caring support at every stage. We bring peace of mind and confidence by carefully analyzing and researching every aspect to deliver the most up-to-date and personalized insights, tailored to the exact day of your pregnancy.

Make the most of our specialized tools, such as the baby kick counter and contraction timer, to monitor your baby’s health. Our pregnancy meal plan ensures you get the essential nutrients for both you and your baby. The weight tracking journal will help you keep an eye on important body changes, offering reassurance and control throughout your pregnancy.

Join us and feel inspired every day! This app provides everything you need to support your pregnancy:

Your personal assistant for every day of your pregnancy:
•	📅 Daily and weekly pregnancy information: Stay informed with real-time updates perfectly aligned with your pregnancy journey.
•	🎨 Colorful illustrations: Track your baby’s growth by comparing its size to familiar fruits and vegetables.
•	🖼️ Ultrasound images: Follow your baby’s development with ultrasound images at each stage.
•	🍏 Nutrition: Personalized meal plans and pregnancy-specific nutrition tips.

Pregnancy Tools:
•	📊 Weight tracking: Monitor your weight with our easy-to-use journal and keep track of changes to maintain your health.
•	🦶 Baby kick counter: Keep track of your baby’s movements and feel connected to each kick.
•	⏱️ Contraction timer: Know when it’s time to head to the hospital with our contraction timer.

Organize & Plan:
•	🛍️ Shopping list: Get everything you need for your baby’s arrival with our pre-made shopping list.
•	🗒️ Daily to-do list: Organize your days with reminders for important tasks.
•	🏥 Hospital bag checklist: Pack everything you need for the hospital with our easy-to-follow checklist.
•	📆 Birth plan: Create a personalized birth plan to share with your doctor to ensure everyone is prepared for the big day.
•	📘 Doctor appointment reminders: Add your appointments to the app calendar, and we’ll send you reminders to make sure you never miss a visit.
•	❓ Questions for your doctor: A handy list of important questions to ask during your next checkup.
•	📚 Baby names: Choose the perfect name from our list of thousands of options.

Access our educational resources for a deep understanding of all aspects of pregnancy. Our app offers extensive collections of medical reference materials, articles, and tips to not only prepare for childbirth but also ensure the healthy development of your child and your well-being.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
We strive to keep our app the best for expectant parents. Your feedback is crucial to us! Please share your comments and suggestions at support@timskiy.com, and we will make every effort to promptly implement your wishes.

⚠️ The app is not intended for medical use and does not replace professional medical consultations. If you have any questions or doubts regarding your pregnancy, please consult with a qualified medical professional.

🌟 Join millions of future parents and their loved ones who have chosen our "Pregnancy Tracker" app! Enjoy every day of pregnancy, and be confident that you are doing everything right for your baby! Download the app now and start your amazing journey into the world of parenthood!"

summary: Track your pregnancy: Daily and Weekly, Kicker Counter, Contraction Timer, Tips
